events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this item is not what I paid for.
The reported issue was identified as a refund request related to receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Sarah Lee has been assigned to handle the refund case for the wrong product received by the customer.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you please send a photo of the product you received as well as the packaging label to verify the order details for processing your refund?
Here are the photos of the item and the label on the box. The product clearly does not match what I ordered, confirming my request for a refund.
Thank you for the photos. I have initiated the refund process, and you should receive the money back on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate the prompt response and am looking forward to the refund showing up soon.
The refund case has been resolved successfully and all necessary actions were confirmed with the customer.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for contacting support.
